Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory57.jpg'}
{3: 'One ordinary afternoon in Eden.'}
{3: 'Sitting in front of her desk, the girl is writing a letter in elegant cursive. Warm artificial sunlight shines through the window, following the tip of her pen.'}
{3: "—...I'll wait for you."}
{3: "—I'll be wearing an Iris behind my ear. You'll recognize me for sure."}
{3: 'She presses the pen slightly harder against the paper, soaking it as she finishes the letter off with a full stop. She wipes the ink off her pen and puts it back into the box.'}
{3: 'She picks up the letter, folds it, then puts it into an envelope and seals it.'}
{3: 'After all the actions, she sighs in relief and stands up.'}
{3: 'With her hands crossed, she presses the envelope close to her chest as if she is making a prayer. Then she collapses onto her bed, facing the ceiling.'}
{3: 'The lights on the ceiling have been reconfigured by her to resemble the starry sky. It is still early in the afternoon, and the "stars" aren\'t lighting up yet.'}
{3: 'Soon, she will be posting the letter out.'}
{3: 'What should she say first if she really sees 【kuroname】 in person?'}
{3: 'She never thought that she would be so troubled by a simple opening speech.'}
{3: 'Would "Nice to meet you" be too distant? They have never met, but she thinks they have known each other well enough after having exchanged so many letters.'}
{3: 'Not to mention that they could have walked past each other long ago at somewhere in Eden.'}
{3: 'Will that person also be looking forward to the meet just like she is?'}
{3: 'The only thing she can confirm is that she has many things to share with that person. Way too many for letters to hold.'}
{3: 'Unable to contain her thoughts, she rolls over on the bed, buries her head in the soft pillow and sighs.'}
{3: "There are still many days before the event, but she can't help thinking about what she needs to do on that day."}
{3: 'What would make a nice self-introduction? What sort of gesture should she take during the dance? And... She must remember to hold her excitement and not do anything inappropriate.'}
{3: '—At least she does not need to worry about the dress. She has someone she can fully trust when it comes to advices on attire and outfit.'}
{3: 'She turns around and looks at a blueprint design on the side table. Its designer has written some comments on it.'}

{1: "The frame's coating is inspired by tango and its structure has taken reference from dancers, making it a great unit for dancing.", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You said you had an important ball coming, right?', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "And I'm still mad at you for applying to become a Construct behind my back!", 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'So just leave it all to me this time!', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Right, the dress is still missing one important accessory. Is there anything that comes to your mind? I need your advice!', 2: 'cc82cfff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Not long ago, her best friend was telling her the inspirations she got on her new frame design.'}
{3: 'According to her plan, the frame would be ready for first adaptation on the day of the WGAA ball. It may not be combat-ready, but is more than enough for a dance.'}
{3: 'Still lost in thought, she catches a glance of the envelope in her hand. It is carefully sealed by wax, with a golden, six-petal flower stamped on top.'}
{3: 'Something has come to her mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '"—O courteous shade! Thou whose fame yet lives, and shall live long as nature lasts!"'}
{3: 'You sense a strange distortion in the objectives in your vision. You shake your head to cast it away, then look back at the surroundings.'}
{3: 'The world in your vision changes again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory15.jpg'}
{3: 'It is the fabulous front yard of the opera house, full of guests in gorgeous outfits. The melody of waltz starts from afar, making your stagnant mind start to move again.'}
{3: "Right, you're waiting for someone."}
{3: 'When you remember it, you hear a long, vague song from a distant place, as if it comes from a creature that does not belong here. You could not tell what it is.'}
{3: 'You look up, trying to look for it. A bell rings, and a brilliant violet comes to the vision.'}
{3: "It's a girl. She walks over with a warm smile, her long hair flying behind like the wings of a mockingbird."}
{2: '???', 3: 'If I may... Have we met before?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The iris on her hair is blooming in the night. The pure purple is reflected in her eyes, lighting up the excitement in them.'}
{3: 'She has recognized you.'}
{2: "Hi, I'm 【kuroname】.", 3: '58'}
{3: 'Iris repeats after you softly, and she smiles like a flower.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'We have finally met.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You call out that name before you realize.'}
{3: 'The girl is slightly shocked. Her purple eyes have darkened.'}
{3: 'But she smiles again the next moment.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'I am your Iris.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'I have finally met you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You just stand there, looking at each other without any words.'}
{3: 'You have a lot to tell each other and a lot of questions to ask, but you just stare at each other in silence as if time has frozen.'}
{3: 'The ball has started and guests are going in. People keep giving weird looks when they walk past.'}
{3: "—It's that famous young opera singer. Why is she..."}
{3: '—Construct...'}
{3: "—It's not a rumor. Who would have thought? Even she has..."}
{3: '—Does it have anything to do with "The Acadia Evacuation" being halted indefinitely?'}
{3: '—Hey, someone ask her for an autograph.'}
{3: '—Did she give up on art?'}
{3: 'You hear many whispers.'}
{3: 'Slightly upset, you walk forward and shield her from the various looks they exchange.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'Is everything alright?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl's crystal clear eyes are always on you, completely unaware that she has become the crowd's focus."}
{3: 'Perhaps she has already accepted everything of her past. Now she is standing in the tempest as a warrior, with even purer faith and love.'}
{3: '—Just like the original form of her soul.'}
{2: "Yeah... It's all good.", 3: '87'}
{3: 'The waltz has come to an end. After a short break, the instruments start to play again. You hear a tango melody.'}
{3: 'The next dance has started.'}
{3: 'You realize you are standing on the edge of the hall.'}
{2: '(Take initiative to invite)', 3: '91', 4: '(Remain silent)', 5: '101'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, you reach out to her.'}
{2: 'Would you like to dance with me?', 3: '94'}
{3: 'The girl blinks and blushes. She crosses her fingers in slight regret.'}
{3: '—I was supposed to ask first.'}
{3: 'Hearing the mumble, you recall the "guidance" she mentioned in the letters and chuckle.'}
{3: 'The girl has already placed her hand in your palm. It feels a little cold, but your heart is softly touched.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: "It's my honor, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take her hand and walk into the brilliant ball room.'}
{3: 'With most days spent in missions and combat drills, it is the first time you come to an occasion like this. You feel a little awkward and lost looking at the chandeliers and dancing guests.'}
{3: 'Iris notices your hesitation.'}
{3: 'She smiles and raises her hand, making a flawless gesture.'}
{2: 'Iris', 3: 'May I invite you for a dance?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl extends her long, svelte arm. But you know very well that now that she has become a Construct, there is great strength both in those arms and in her mind.'}
{3: 'The iris-colored eyes look at you, cheering you up quietly and gently.'}
{3: 'You rest your hand in her palm without hesitation.'}
{3: 'Iris takes your hand and walks into the brilliant ball room.'}
